Package org.apache.heron.metricscachemgr

Class MetricsCacheManagerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.common.network.HeronServer
      • org.apache.heron.metricscachemgr.MetricsCacheManagerServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISelectHandler
    public class MetricsCacheManagerServer
extends HeronServer
    server to accept metrics from a particular sink in metrics manager

    Differece from MetricsCacheManagerHttpServer: 1. MetricsCacheManagerServer accepts metric publishing message from sinks; MetricsCacheManagerHttpServer responds to queries. 2. MetricsCacheManagerServer is a HeronServer; MetricsCacheManagerHttpServer is a http server
